meanings.sent1: The rubber band was stretchier than the string.
meanings.sent2: The yoga pants were stretchier than the jeans.
meanings.sent3: The balloon animal made by the clown looked even stretchier than the real animals!
meanings.sent4: Her patience seemed to be as stretchier as a rubber band, always able to handle more.
meanings.sent5: The slime toy felt incredibly stretchier, like taffy in your hands.

meanings.definition: More capable of being stretched than something else.
meanings.sent1: The new fabric was stretchier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The elastic band was stretchier than the hair tie.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's powers seemed even stretchier than a rubber band!
meanings.sent4: His imagination was as stretchier as a rubber band, always reaching for new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The bubblegum was incredibly stretchier, like taffy in your mouth.

meanings.definition: To become more capable of being stretched.
meanings.sent1: After warming up, the muscles stretchier easily.
meanings.sent2: The dough stretchier as it rose.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to stretchier every time it woke up from a nap!
meanings.sent4: Her mind began to stretchier, exploring new possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The rubber band slowly stretchier, ready to snap at any moment.
